name: solana-sniper
description: Autonomous Solana memecoin detection, safety analysis, and execution engine

scripts.backtest:once: tsx -e "import { runEnhancedBacktest } from './src/analysis/historical-data.js'; runEnhancedBacktest().then(r => { console.log(JSON.stringify({winRate: r.winRate, pnl: r.totalPnlUsd, trades: r.totalTrades, sharpe: r.sharpeRatio, profitFactor: r.profitFactor}, null, 2)); process.exit(0); })"
